## ControlType enum

Type of control you'd like rendered for a setting. This uses traditional names but maps to controls available in the Fluent control set. E.g., 'textbox' is a Textfield.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum ControlType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Checkbox | <code>&quot;checkbox&quot;</code> |  |

|  Radio | <code>&quot;radio&quot;</code> |  |
|  Slider | <code>&quot;slider&quot;</code> |  |
|  Spinner | <code>&quot;spinner&quot;</code> |  |
|  Textbox | <code>&quot;textbox&quot;</code> |  |
|  Toggle | <code>&quot;toggle&quot;</code> |  |
